h1_title: How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor
h2_title: How to Unlock Zodiac Village in The Painted Realm
content: Now you have the scroll, a number of NPCs you've already encountered in your journey will be reunited in the village. This will now act as a central hub where you can find Xu Dog, Shen Monkey, Chen Loong, and a new character - Yin Tiger.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Zodiac_Village_and_Upgrade_Armor.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor', specifically from the subsection 'How to Unlock Zodiac Village in The Painted Realm'.
The content is as follows:
Now you have the scroll, a number of NPCs you've already encountered in your journey will be reunited in the village. This will now act as a central hub where you can find Xu Dog, Shen Monkey, Chen Loong, and a new character - Yin Tiger.
